Package com.viaoa.servlet

Custom servlets that perform automatic services for web based components.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ImageServlet
    Get an image from an Object Property similar to protocol handler: com.viaoa.jfc.editor.html.protocol.classpath.Handler Note: images were stored in byte[] property using OAImageUtil.convertToBytes(), which uses *.jpg format get params: c|class, i|id, p|prop|property, mw|maxw (max width), mh|maxh (max height)
    JNLPServlet
    servlet used to serve up JNLP files, and dynamically set the codebase data, and other information within the jnlp text file.
    JsonServlet
    Get JSON data.
    PdfServlet
    Get byte[] for PDF from an Object Property get params: c|class, i|id, p|prop|property)
    SecurityServlet
    Get an image from an Object Property similar to protocol handler: com.viaoa.jfc.editor.html.protocol.classpath.Handler Note: images were stored in byte[] property using OAImageUtil.convertToBytes(), which uses *.jpg format get params: c|class, i|id, p|prop|property, mw|maxw (max width), mh|maxh (max height)
    XMLServlet
    Get XML data from OA.

Package com.viaoa.servlet Description

Custom servlets that perform automatic services for web based components.
